gastronomy.name: Restaurante Jenny
gastronomy.description: Authentic Santanderean cuisine featuring traditional dishes like cabrito, mute, and fresh river fish in a cozy family atmosphere.

gastronomy.name: Café del Río
gastronomy.description: Specialty coffee shop with locally grown beans and homemade pastries. Perfect spot to relax after adventure activities.

culture.name: Cueva del Indio
culture.description: Historic limestone cave system with ancient indigenous petroglyphs and guided tours through stunning rock formations.

culture.name: Catedral de San Gil
culture.description: Beautiful colonial cathedral dating back to the 18th century, featuring stunning architecture and religious art.

adventure.name: Paragliding San Gil
adventure.description: Tandem paragliding experience over the stunning Chicamocha Canyon with certified instructors and breathtaking views.
adventure.address: Mesa de Los Santos, San Gil

adventure.name: Rafting Río Suarez
adventure.description: Exciting white water rafting adventure through Class II-III rapids with professional guides and safety equipment included.

shops.name: FixMyPhone
shops.description: Professional phone and electronic device repair services with genuine parts and quick turnaround times.

shops.name: Artesanías del Fonce
shops.description: Traditional handicrafts and souvenirs made by local artisans, including woven textiles and pottery.

shop_products.name: San Gil Adventure T-Shirt
shop_products.description: Premium cotton t-shirt featuring San Gil's iconic landscape and adventure sports graphics.

shop_products.name: Chicamocha Canyon Hoodie
shop_products.description: Comfortable hoodie with stunning canyon artwork and San Gil branding.
